description_for_human: AI Portfolio Platform with Gamified Learning & Discovery. Browse PUBLIC AI projects, tools, and learning resources.
description_for_model: AllThrive AI is a platform for discovering PUBLIC AI/ML content. Access is limited to explicitly public data: (1) PUBLIC AI project portfolios marked as showcase by creators, (2) PUBLIC AI tool directory and reviews, (3) PUBLIC learning resources and tutorials, (4) PUBLIC community profiles (only users who opted-in). IMPORTANT: User privacy is protected - only access data explicitly marked as public by users. Do not attempt to access private profiles, draft projects, or user activity data.
data_usage_policy: Only accesses PUBLIC data explicitly marked as discoverable by users. User privacy is respected - private profiles, draft projects, and personal data are not accessible.
data_retention: We do not store user queries or personal information
